column1: The accused-appellant was present before the High Court and prosecution witnesses 1 (PW 1) was
absent on 29.01.2007 but PW 2 and PW 4 were present. According to page 44 of the appeal brief,
the learned High Court Judge re-fixed the matter for trial as there were few partly heard cases to
be taken up for trial on 29.01.2007.
Section 196 of the criminal procedure code is as follows;
